name: Stolen Time (hirnstuermer)
description:
Co-op puzzle platformer for PC

„After getting trapped inside a mysterious grandfather clock,

two brothers have to use their newly acquired ability

of manipulating time to find an escape before it’s too late.“

Stolen Time is a puzzle game that presents you with the challenge of navigating levels together in a 2.5D environment.

All the way from the gloomy bottom of the fantastical grandfathers clock the brothers Aika and Kello are trapped in to its clock face at the top many challenges block your way.

You have to utilize their shared ability to open a time bubble via which they can access the environment of each level as it used to be long before they became imprisoned in the clock.

Controls

This is a local co-op game that requires at least one controller.
Use either two controllers or one controller and a keyboard.
Wanna play remotely? Play it online via Parsec!

We are Team BigBrian

We're a team of university students who spent the past three months 

developing our very first group project.

Caroline Peter
